lead_paragraph: Power crews have restored electricity to most communities, but about 1,500 homes could be without power for weeks, officials of the Cheyenne River Sioux Tribe said.
snippet: Power crews have restored electricity to most communities, but about 1,500 homes could be without power for weeks, officials of the Cheyenne River Sioux Tribe said.

headline.main: Many on South Dakota Reservation Remain Without Power After Storm
headline.seo: Many on South Dakota's Cheyenne River Sioux Reservation Remain Without Power After Storm
headline.print_headline: Many on South Dakota Reservation Remain Without Power After Storm
